properties.entry: SELECT USER_NO, USER_ID,USER_PWD,USER_NAME,PHONE,EMAIL,ADDRESS, ENROLL_DATE,STATUS,ADMIN,LAWYER FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID = ? AND USER_PWD = ? AND STATUS ='Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER(USER_NO, USER_ID, USER_PWD, USER_NAME, PHONE, EMAIL, ADDRESS) VALUES (SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE USER_ID =?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL =?
UPDATE MEMBER SET USER_PWD = ?, USER_NAME =?, PHONE =?, EMAIL =?, ADDRESS =? WHERE USER_ID=? AND STATUS = 'Y'
